Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.6 Å (aperture of triangular window), 3–7 Å (range from cavity size distribution)

Other Information.Additional Info: The pore size of IM-UIO-66-AS (3–7 Å) effectively blocks vanadium ions via size sieving and Donnan exclusion effects.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Kinetic sieving through internal proton channels

Other Information.Additional Info: Protons are transported efficiently through internal hydrogen-bonding networks and interfacial 'acid-base' pairs in the material.

Experimental Validation.Method: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), vanadium-ion permeability tests
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Proton conductivity: 12.2 mS cm−1, vanadium-ion permeability: 7.0 × 10−7 cm2 min−1

Other Information.Additional Info: The material exhibits enhanced ion selectivity and proton conductivity due to reconstructed proton channels via modified Zr-MOFs.
